 Prepaid Promotion for recharging via Airtime/EZ 1. Eligibility: Pre-paid subscribers (active, being blocked 1 or 2 ways communication, at the time of keeping subscription; in the first 10 top up - will be considered as recharging for one time) , Postpaid switches to Prepaid and top up via EZ, Airtime including: &#183; Method 2 : Top up by Toolkit sim &#183; Or method 3 : Top up - Top up online 2. Benefits: &#183; Bonus 20% top-up value: bonus 10% on KM2 credit and 10% on KM3 credit (Ex: top-up VND50.000, customer will get VND5.000đ on KM2 and VND 5.000 on KM3). &#183; Unlimited times of top-up and value of scratch-cards. . &#183; Subscribers which are eligible for other top-up promotions -> can join the promotion which has highest benefits. Ex: New activate prepaid is joining Promotion for 1 st 10 top-up time within this promotion time: get benefits of Promotion for 1 st 10 top-up time (NOT this promotion) - Notes: &#183; VAT included. &#183; Charging principle will be rounded up as current regulation. . 3. Promotion time : From 01/08/2013 to 09/08/2013 Airtime/EZ &#28192;&#36947;&#20805;&#20540;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; 1. &#23545;&#35937;&#65306; &#39044;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143;&#65288; ( &#50696; : 50.000 &#46041; &#52649;&#51204; &#49884; KM2 &#50640; 5.000 &#46041;&#44284; KM3 &#50640; 5000 &#46041;&#51012; &#52628;&#44032; &#51396;&#44553;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; ) &#52649;&#51204; &#44552;&#50529; &#48143; &#52649;&#51204;&#54943;&#49688;&#45716; &#51228;&#54620;&#51060; &#50630;&#49845;&#45768;&#45796;. &#50668;&#47084; &#52649;&#51204; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#49549;&#54624; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;: &#52572;&#45824; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#51080;&#45716; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640;&#47564; &#52280;&#44032;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. Ví dụ: &#50696;&#49884;: &#52395;&#52852;&#46300;&#47196; &#52649;&#51204; &#49884; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45716; &#49352;&#44032;&#51077; &#49440;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44592;&#44036;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#52395;&#52852;&#46300;&#47196; &#52649;&#51204; &#49884; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796;. &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . 3. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#44592;&#44036;: 2013 &#45380;08&#50900;01 &#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380;08&#50900;09 &#51068; &#44620;&#51648; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6031;&#6070;&#6025; Airtime/EZ 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078; &#6102; &#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;(&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;,&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;1&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;,​ 2&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;,&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;,&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6036;&#6098;&#6031;&#6076;&#6042;&#6033;&#6085;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;,&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6031;&#6070;&#6025; EZ, Airtime &#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035; &#6102; &#183; &#6042;&#6076;&#6036;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6033;&#6072; 2&#6102; &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041; 5.000đ &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;KM2, 5.000đ​ &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; KM3)&#6100; &#183; &#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6026;&#6020;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6100; &#183; &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6102;
